description: Associates a backup gateway with your server. After you complete the association process, you can back up and restore your VMs through the gateway.

parameters.name: GatewayArn
parameters.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the gateway. Use the ListGateways operation to return a list of gateways for your account and Amazon Web Services Region.

parameters.name: ServerArn
parameters.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the server that hosts your virtual machines.

nested_items.name: GatewayArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of a gateway.
